text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Don't be discouraged ―it's something that should 
be obvious. Such possibility does not exist. 
It must not exist.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Because it is synonymous with closing the curtain. 
A constant applause for a glorious victory. ―therefore.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Be brilliant. Be supreme. Always shine the brightest. 
That is my family's motto.

The training course was even more crowded 
than usual that day. Was it cheering, 
shout of joy, or amazement?

While many emotions are voiced and mixed together, 
The eyes are focused on a single point.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, over here! 
It's already started!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
The girl my senior told me to keep an eye on… 
Look, it's that girl.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Right? Senpai, the front is pretty crowded too, 
it will be difficult to recover from here… and even more.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
…and the other runners are already debuting 
horse girl, is what you want to say right? 
Well just watch. She's just getting started.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: (―The front was blocked. But still within the expected range)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(No problem. There won't be a problem. 
Just like always ―my path has been shown to me.)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Ha…!!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What… you must be joking!?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Incredible end leg…… 
She's part of that Noble family.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Daiichi Ruby…!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaa!!

A Noble family. The legitimate heir to a 
bloodline that has made their name in politics, 
business, and even in the world of horse girl race.

There is probably no one in this country who has 
not heard that name. And the horse girl of that family is…
(Wooooooooo…!!)

― Daiichi Ruby. This horse girl finished faster 
than all the other horse girls who had already 
made their debuts.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That was amazing…… So that's the rumored 
member of Noble family, Daiichi Ruby. 
I guess it's starting to get serious.

I wonder what kind of trainer will she get? 
Many trainers have already gathered 
around her to scout her.

For myself… I don't have much confidence. 
But once you saw that run…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
… Dear trainer. 
I would like to take this opportunity to tell you something.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ―Bring it to me.

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text: Yes, milady. We will distribute them now.

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
Here are the details of the selection test to determine 
milady personal trainer. Please take a moment to 
review the details.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Each item contains detailed information about the test. 
Any trainer is welcome to participate.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
The duration is 30 days. We will give you an evaluation 
for each test and the overall evaluation will be used 
to determine the result.

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
If there is a tie, we will set up another test. 
Is there any questions? If there is, I will be 
happy to answer them.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ballroom dance and table manners… and there are 
other thing too, this is not something average 
person can learn in 30 days!

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
As you say, it's not easy task. 
But you understand that, and that's why you are 
right here, are you not?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
If there is nothing else, I will leave it at that. 
Thank you for your time.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
If you wish to participate in the test, please change 
into clothes that are easy to move in and come 
to the dojo. It will be the first venue.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It's not going to be easy by the looks of it… 
It looks like seniors have already gone to change 
their clothes, What are you going to do?

… I think it's a chance. 
At a first glance, the content of the test has 
nothing to do with the trainer's job.

It was a test that none of the people gathered 
here had ever experienced before. This means 
that everyone start from the same position.

And if I manage to win, I can guide Daiichi 
Ruby's run with my own hand.

Imagining yourself passing the selection test. 
you feels like you're dreaming, and feel a little excited.

―But the reality is not that sweet. 
A voice that blows away the excitement 
echoes through the dojo.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
That's right, now repeat the move! 
It's not about power, all you need is the flow…… 
don't let your guard down!! Come on!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Haa……!

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
This is self-defense practice. Shall we move in 
a flowing manner? Lady Ruby has been training 
since she was young.

As I recall, the details of the selection test said 
"take self-defense training and acquire a certain skill"
choice_data_list: That's what we're going to do……?
That's what we're going to do……?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
So that's everyone, right? 
Now let's get started.

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
Certainly, Lady Ruby…… 
But I see that there are a few people who 
are reluctant to participate.

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
If you are frightened at this level, you will 
not be able to move forward. Polished confidence 
leads to shining dignity.

text_block_list.name: Ruby's butler
text_block_list.text:
Please be prepared and aware that you are 
serving the Noble family and their daughter, 
Daiichi Ruby-sama.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
This is the end of our conversation. I am the one 
who will make the final decision. Ladies and gentlemen, 
please take on the challenge with all your heart.
